resources.string:
0.8.1 (Feb 26, 2019)
- Fix build bug which is stopping F-Droid, now disable error on lint. Thank you edaubert!

- German translation by Luensche, thank you!

0.8.0 (May 26, 2018)
- From Android 8.1 COARSE_LOCATION permission is needed to access WiFi SSID! Also it seems that location services needs to be turned on as well, otherwise the SSID reported will be \"unknown ssid\".

- Setting to run AN2Linux as a foreground service, thank you Eyenseo!
From Android Oreo (8.0) some new limitations about background services have been added to help with battery drain etc. Which means that AN2Linux might be killed by the system. So if you run Android Oreo+ and have problems with AN2Linux missing notifications, then you could try to run AN2Linux as a foreground service.

- Dutch translation by Vistaus, thank you!

- Spanish translation by CalebCDE, thank you!

0.7.0 (Jan 16, 2018)
- New icon created by conrad-heimbold@github, thank you!

0.6.0 (May 12, 2017)
- New preference added for minimum notification priority

0.5.1 (Apr 12, 2017)
- Fix bug that caused AN2Linux to crash when opening individual app settings (affecting Android 4.4-5.1)

0.5.0 (Apr 5, 2017)
- Replace sha1 with sha256

0.4.0 (Apr 1, 2017)
- Allow notification settings to be set individually per app

0.3.0 (Feb 6, 2017)
- New preference added for custom icon size

0.2.0 (Jan 9, 2017)
- New preference added for Android 5.0+ Lollipop users: "Block local notifications"

0.1.1 (Jan 7, 2017)
- Fix bug that made AN2Linux unusable for Android 4.4 KitKat users (using ciphers not supported until 5.0)

0.1.0 (Jan 2, 2017)
- Initial release
